title: MiniGARO
sinopse: A short web-anime created for the "miniGARO" project, which imagines characters from the Garo franchise as super-deformed caricatures. Each episode respectively promotes the the Garo Gaiden: Tougen no Fue and Zero: Black Blood films and teaches theater etiquette. The "MiniGARO Manner Movie" entry shown with the actual films, continues where these commercials left off.
